answerText: spin[10] This law named for an Austrian physicist forbids fermions from occupying the same quantum state, resulting in spin degeneracy pressure in late-stage stellar evolution.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 10 | 8 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The first experimental evidence of this quantity's existence was the Stern-Gerlach experiment.  [10] Name this quantity, the measure of a particle's intrinsic angular momentum.
